mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID, (SELECT T3.ITEM_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T3 WHERE T3.ITEM_ID = T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID)AS PARENT_ITEM_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM_VALUE T1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID WHERE T1.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.EVAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID

SELECT DISTINCT T2.ITEM_ID, T2.ITEM_NAME, T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID, (SELECT T3.ITEM_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T3 WHERE T3.ITEM_ID = T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID)AS PARENT_ITEM_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM_VALUE T1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID WHERE T1.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.EVAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID,T2.ITEM_ID

SELECT DISTINCT T2.ITEM_ID, T2.ITEM_NAME, T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID, (SELECT T3.ITEM_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T3 WHERE T3.ITEM_ID = T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID)AS PARENT_ITEM_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM_VALUE T1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID WHERE T1.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.EVAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID IS NULL ORDER BY T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID,T2.ITEM_ID

SELECT ROWNUM AS RID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, ORDER_NO, SUM_SCORE, instance_id, bonuspoints, ID objectId FROM ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SUM_SCORE DESC)AS ORDER_NO, SUM_SCORE, instance_id, bonuspoints, ID FROM ( SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, SUM(FINAL_ITEM_VALUE)+nvl(bonuspoints,0) AS SUM_SCORE, instance_id, bonuspoints, ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.EVAL_OBJECT_ID AS USER_ID, instance_id, T1.EVAL_OBJECT_NAME AS USER_NAME, T1.TABLE_ID, T1.ITEM_ID, T1.FINAL_ITEM_VALUE, t3.bonuspoints, t3.ID FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM_VALUE T1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_OBJECT t3 ON t1.EVAL_OBJECT_ID=t3.object_id AND t1.Instance_Id=t3.eval_instance_id WHERE T1.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.EVAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ) GROUP BY USER_ID ,USER_NAME ,instance_id,bonuspoints,ID ) )

SELECT T1.EVAL_OBJECT_ID AS USER_ID, T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID, T2.ITEM_ID, T1.FINAL_ITEM_VALUE FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM_VALUE T1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID WHERE T1.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.EVAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID,T2.ITEM_ID

SELECT T1.EVAL_OBJECT_ID AS USER_ID, T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID, T2.ITEM_ID, T1.FINAL_ITEM_VALUE, T1.INSTANCE_ID instanceId FROM TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM_VALUE T1 INNER JOIN TA_JC_EVAL_ITEM T2 ON T1.ITEM_ID = T2.ITEM_ID WHERE T1.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T1.EVAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID IS NULL ORDER BY T1.EVAL_OBJECT_ID,T2.PARENT_ITEM_ID,T1.ITEM_ID

SELECT T5.TABLE_ID, T5.TABLE_NAME FROM TA_JC_EVAL_TABLE T5 WHERE T5.AREA_CODE IN ( SELECT SUBSTR(CODE,0,12) FROM V_ORG WHERE ID = #{org_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND T5.IS_VALID = 'Y' AND T5.EVAL_OBJECT_TYPE = '3'
